h1. FBVariable

Defines a variable to pass to FinalBuilder.  

h2. Version

Available from version 1.3

h2. Examples

{code:xml|borderStyle=solid}
<FBVariable name="variable" value="something" />
{code}


h2. Configuration Elements

|| Element || Description || Type || Required || Default || Version ||
| name | The name of the variable.   | String | Yes | _n/a_ | 1.3 |
| value | The value for the variable.   | String | Yes | _n/a_ | 1.3 |
